metadata.description:
Shōnen 少年 - (Shinyuu 親友 Collection)

When we are children, things are simpler, friendships are made more easily, we bond with anyone who shows a smile. A boy and a cat is what I chose to represent my meaning of "friendship", children are pure beings and how they bond has a lot to teach mere adults like us


Illustration in old paper by Hannya
5867 x7467 - 300 DPI 
PNG - Procreate + Photoshop
metadata.name: Shōnen 少年 #1/13
